Hi Bobby! I just bought Rao’s at the Costco in Brandon, FL this past weekend. Absolutely love it! And I believe I paid around $8 for the 2 pack. Wish I would have bought more! Was even able to get my flu shot & booster while there! Costco us the best! Thanks for sharing your clean living tips! I’m trying to get there!
